img_above_text:
![Wukong MiddleHollow 29.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/6/64/Wukong_MiddleHollow_29.jpg)
Watch out for some Wasp Guai hiding in the cocoons (which won't be as bad if you dealt with the archer above). As the path opens up, you can spot the other Shrine across the chasm, with this path leading up the left side.
img_below_text:
Prepare to deal with a group of Stone Spiders, as another archer posted on a high rock will try to make things difficult, but you can sprint over to find a wooden ramp behind him.
![Wukong MiddleHollow 35.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/a/a8/Wukong_MiddleHollow_35.jpg)

content.text:
You are given an image and related metadata and context.

            Image Position:
            - This is 33 from the file 'Webbed_Hollow_-_Middle_Hollow_Walkthrough.md'.

            Context:
            - Preceding Text: "![Wukong MiddleHollow 29.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/6/64/Wukong_MiddleHollow_29.jpg)
Watch out for some Wasp Guai hiding in the cocoons (which won't be as bad if you dealt with the archer above). As the path opens up, you can spot the other Shrine across the chasm, with this path leading up the left side."
            - Following Text: "Prepare to deal with a group of Stone Spiders, as another archer posted on a high rock will try to make things difficult, but you can sprint over to find a wooden ramp behind him.
![Wukong MiddleHollow 35.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/a/a8/Wukong_MiddleHollow_35.jpg)"

            Your task:
            1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
            2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.

img_summary: The image depicts a scene from the game "Black Myth: Wukong," where the protagonist is navigating through a rocky, dimly lit cave. The environment is tense, with a visible threat from a Stone Spider on the ground and an archer positioned on a high rock, ready to attack. The player must strategize to overcome these obstacles, using the surroundings to their advantage, such as sprinting towards a wooden ramp behind the archer. The image captures the game's atmospheric and challenging nature, emphasizing the need for vigilance and tactical movement.
